DOC.brief_summary: Purpose study evaluate 2 formulation Romosozumab ( AMG785 ) Postmenopausal Women With Osteoporosis .
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized Phase 3 Study Evaluate 2 Different Formulations Romosozumab Postmenopausal Women With Osteoporosis
